LanguageData.XFMParmor_FixMachine.label: repair mechframe armor
LanguageData.XFMParmor_FixMachine.description: Repair damaged mechframe armor with mechframe armor components.
LanguageData.XFMParmor_ChangePowerCell.label: replace battery
LanguageData.XFMParmor_ChangePowerCell.description: Replace spent mechframe battery with charged ones. For power grid safety concerns, only full batteries may be installed.
LanguageData.XFMParmor_ReplenishSupply.label: replenish supply module
LanguageData.XFMParmor_ReplenishSupply.description: Replenish the stock of field supply module using supply rations.
LanguageData.XFMParmor_FillSupply.label: fill supply module
LanguageData.XFMParmor_FillSupply.description: Completely fill the internal capacity of field supply module. Extra supply rations will be refunded.
LanguageData.XFMParmor_MakePowerCell.label: Make mechframe battery
LanguageData.XFMParmor_MakePowerCell.description: Make batteries designed to power mechframes.
LanguageData.XFMParmor_MakeModuleSupply.label: Make field supply ration
LanguageData.XFMParmor_MakeModuleSupply.description: Package food and chemicals into field supply rations ready to be inserted into supply modules.
